017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.lang.internal;
019
020import static java.util.Objects.isNull;
021import static java.util.Objects.nonNull;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.NULL_STRING;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.requireNonNullArgument;
025
026import java.util.Objects;
027import java.util.Optional;
028import java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock;
029import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;
030import java.util.function.Supplier;
031
032import org.apiguardian.api.API;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.lang.Lazy;
035
036/**
037 *  The implementation of the interface
038 *  {@link Lazy}.
039 *
040 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
041 *  @version $Id: LazyImpl.java 991 2022-01-16 16:58:29Z tquadrat $
042 *  @since 0.0.5
043 *
044 *  @param  <T> The type of the value for this instance of {@code Lazy}.
045 */
046@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: LazyImpl.java 991 2022-01-16 16:58:29Z tquadrat $" )
047@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
048public final class LazyImpl<T> implements Lazy<T>
049{
050        /*------------*\
051    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
052        \*------------*/
053    /**
054     *  The lock that protects the value creation. It will be set to
055     *  {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty}
056     *  after
057     *  {@link #m_Value} is initialised.
058     */
059    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
060    private Optional<Lock> m_Lock;
061
062    /**
063     *  The supplier for the value of this {@code Lazy} instance. It will be
064     *  set to {@code null} after
065     *  {@link #m_Value}
066     *  is initialised.
067     */
068    private Supplier<T> m_Supplier;
069
070    /**
071     *  The value of this {@code Lazy} instance; it is {@code null} if it was
072     *  not yet initialised.
073     */
074    private T m_Value;
075
076        /*--------------*\
077    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
078        \*--------------*/
079    /**
080     *  Creates a new {@code Lazy} instance.
081     *
082     *  @param  supplier    The supplier that initialises the value for this
083     *      instance on the first call to
084     *      {@link #get()}.
085     */
086    @SuppressWarnings( "resource" )
087    public LazyImpl( final Supplier<T> supplier )
088    {
089        m_Supplier = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" );
090        m_Lock = Optional.of( new ReentrantLock() );
091        m_Value = null;
092    }   //  LazyImpl()
093
094    /**
095     *  Creates a new {@code Lazy} instance that is already initialised.
096     *
097     *  @param  value   The value; can be {@code null}.
098     *
099     *  @see Object#clone()
100     */
101    public LazyImpl( final T value )
102    {
103        m_Supplier = null;
104        m_Lock = Optional.empty();
105        m_Value = value;
106    }   //  Lazy()
107
108        /*---------*\
109    ====** Methods **==========================================================
110        \*---------*/
111    /**
112     *  {@inheritDoc}
113     */
114    @Override
115    public final boolean equals( final Object obj )
116    {
117        var retValue = this == obj;
118        if( !retValue && nonNull( obj ) )
119        {
120            if( obj instanceof Lazy other )
121            {
122                retValue = get().equals( other.get() );
123            }
124            else
125            {
126                retValue = get().equals( obj );
127            }
128        }
129
130        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
131        return retValue;
132    }   //  equals()
133
134    /**
135     *  {@inheritDoc}
136     */
137    @Override
138    public final T get()
139    {
140        m_Lock.ifPresent( lock ->
141        {
142            try
143            {
144                lock.lock();
145
146                /*
147                 * When the lock is present, the supplier must have been not
148                 * null; this is enforced by the respective constructor.
149                 * So when the supplier is NOW null, another thread has
150                 * performed the initialisation while this one was waiting for
151                 * the lock.
152                 */
153                if( nonNull( m_Supplier ) )
154                {
155                    m_Value = m_Supplier.get();
156                    m_Lock = Optional.empty();
157                    m_Supplier = null;
158                }
159            }
160            finally
161            {
162                lock.unlock();
163            }
164        } );
165
166        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
167        return m_Value;
168    }   //  get()
169
170    /**
171     *  {@inheritDoc}
172     */
173    @Override
174    public final int hashCode() { return get().hashCode(); }
175
176    /**
177     *  {@inheritDoc}
178     */
179    @Override
180    public final boolean isPresent() { return isNull( m_Supplier ); }
181
182    /**
183     *  {@inheritDoc}
184     */
185    @Override
186    public <X extends Throwable> T orElseThrow( final Supplier<? extends X> exceptionSupplier ) throws X
187    {
188        if( !isPresent() ) throw exceptionSupplier.get();
189
190        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
191        return m_Value;
192    }   //  orElseThrow()
193
194    /**
195     *  {@inheritDoc}
196     */
197    @Override
198    public final String toString()
199    {
200        final var retValue = Objects.toString( m_Value, isPresent() ? NULL_STRING : "[Not initialized]" );
201
202        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
203        return retValue;
204    }   //  toString()
205}
206//  class LazyImpl
207
208/*
209 *  End of File
210 */
